headlines.description: Jurgen Locadia pounced just before the hour as Brighton carved out a 1-0 home win against an unlucky Everton side who hit the woodwork twice.
headlines.shortLinkText: Locadia strike gives Brighton win over Everton

headlines.description: Fulham boosted their Premier League survival hopes after Aleksandar Mitrovic scored a stoppage-time winner to give them a 1-0 win over Huddersfield.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mitrovic saves Fulham after Kamara penalty row

headlines.description: A 92nd-minute goal from midfielder Victor Camarasa and a penalty save from goalkeeper Neil Etheridge ensured Cardiff City beat Leicester.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cardiff earn first away win with late Camarasa goal

headlines.description: Tottenham's title charge suffered a blow as they were beaten 3-1 by Wolves at Wembley.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs' title charge halted with Wolves defeat

headlines.description: Abdoulaye Doucoure came off the bench to bundle home the equaliser and then almost grab a winner as Watford secured a 1-1 draw with Newcastle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Super sub Doucoure comes off bench to save Watford

headlines.description: Roberto Firmino scored a hat trick as Liverpool came from behind to hammer Arsenal 5-1 and opened up a nine-point lead at the top of the table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool hammer Arsenal with Firmino hat trick
